meanings.definition: The belief that Christ will return after a period of peace and prosperity on earth.
meanings.sent1: Many people follow postmillennialism, hoping for a time of peace before Christ's return.
meanings.sent2: Postmillennialism teaches that Christ will come back after a time of peace and prosperity.
meanings.sent3: In a world full of chaos, postmillennialism offers a hopeful vision of the future.
meanings.sent4: The idea of postmillennialism shines like a beacon of hope in troubled times.
meanings.sent5: Postmillennialism paints a picture of a bright future after a period of peace and prosperity.

meanings.definition: The doctrine that the second coming of Christ will occur after the millennium.
meanings.sent1: The church's teachings on postmillennialism include the belief in Christ's return after the millennium.
meanings.sent2: Postmillennialism holds that Christ will come back following the millennium.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a world where postmillennialism means waiting for Christ's return after a thousand years.
meanings.sent4: The concept of postmillennialism stands as a promise of Christ's eventual return.
meanings.sent5: Postmillennialism envisions Christ's second coming after the completion of the millennium.
